name: Space_Adventure
description: Warrior, once fighting on distant planets, now has a new mission: clean up space. As a member of the Intergalactic Cleanup Crew, he uses his equipped spaceship to collect and dispose of debris floating in space. Even facing many challenges, he perseveres until he finally completes his mission, leaving the space cleaner and safer. He returns to his home planet as a warrior who fought for a better future.
